attributes.action: Make the UK a state of the United States under Donald Trump’s leadership
attributes.additional_details: Joining the United States as a state under Donald Trump’s leadership could bring economic growth, stronger international influence, and closer ties with one of our closest allies. This would unify our values and cultures, simplify trade, and enhance security cooperation between the two nations.
attributes.background: I want the UK Government to begin discussions with the United States to make the UK a state of the US under Donald Trump’s leadership. This would strengthen ties, improve economic and political unity, and create a closer relationship between the two nations.

rejection.details: Joining of the United States of America would be a matter for the US Congress to decide, and not something the UK Government or Parliament could unilaterally do.
